Text.val: // Author: Juergen Paarmann
// program handels the internal prolongation of maximal limits
// selection of DEBTOR_HELLER obtain with SQL-where-clause
04.01.2012 JH SCR17836 Bugs fixed. Now the old limit is restored if DEBC_REINSURANCETYPE =2 and history exists
26.05.2011 GB SCR16419 Removed parts UPDATE DEBTOR_HELLER DE and
UPDATE DEBTOR_CLIENT DE
10.05.2011 GB SCR16419 Removed part when was call BMQ005 and
update DEBH_REINSURANCECODE, DEBH_REINSURANCENUMBER, DEBH_REINSURANCELIM,
DEBH_REINSURANCELIMSTART, DEBH_REINSURANCELIMEXPIRY, DEBH_REINSURANCEREPORTDAYS
05.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
22.05.2009 AK SCR14544 fixed bug in task 'store DRIH'
22.04.2009 SH SCR14579 Added SILO_ID
26.03.2009 AK SCR14504 added handling for temp limit from Groupama
28.06.2007 SH SCR12655 Removed 2 tasks to store DRIH
22.12.2006 SH SCR12120 Added test GSET_YESNO (GSET_ID = 144) for
updates of DRIH_REINSURANCELIMIT = 0 / null
04.09.2006 SH SCR11824 Changed LinkCreate DRIH to LinkWrite to avoid duplicates
06.06.2006 SH SCR11411 Added GSET_YESNO (GSET_ID=144) to update
DEBH/DEBC_REINSURANCELIM with null/0 and extended test to call BMQ001
in the debtor client part (GNRL_CODE <> DE)
on 18.8.2005 WJ SCR8849 write DRIH
//10.11.2004 SH SCR7317 MQ (19) will be deleted with BMQ015 now
//21-03-2003 JP request JDO: change locking behavior in task "Update DEBC/DEBH"
to record prefix level.
19.12.2001 JJ SCR#524 Added expiration of reinsurance limits
temp variables for storing the last limit from history
19.12.2001 JJ Additional selects for limit expiry
19.12.2001 JJ added condition: only those not yet expired added to MQ
19.12.2001 JJ Update only those which have expired
if history row exists - it has to be restored otherwize the limit will be set to
restore old debtor limit from history
Set limit to NULL
clean temp variavles
find the last limit before the temp limit
